lead_paragraph: TANANBAUM--Stanley (Skipper). Ricki Conway and her husband Robert Conway mourn the passing of her beloved father Stanley (Skipper) Tananbaum on April 15, 2016 at the age of 95. Predeceased by his adoring wife of 74 years Doris Tananbaum, Stanley is lovingly remembered by his grandchildren Laurence and Beth Zuriff and Bryan and Monica Zuriff and his great-grandchildren Sophie, Jason, Alexa, Maxine, Jordana and Jasper. Skip was a man who lived life to the fullest. He was a World War II Navy Pilot, transatlantic regatta racer, avid skier, world traveler, business leader and philanthropist. His joie de vivre will be deeply missed by all. 1/3
